CustomField.description: The url parameters for the action. Multiple parameters may be passed by using the ampersand character to separate each parameter. Each parameter is expressed in the form param-name=param-value. For e.g. templateName=XYZ&draft=true
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The url parameters for the action. Multiple parameters may be passed by using the ampersand character to separate each parameter. Each parameter is expressed in the form param-name=param-value. For e.g. templateName=XYZ&draft=true
CustomField.label: Action Params
